original_title: BSF: India's First Line of Defence
overview: BSF: India's First Line of Defence is a documentary created by National Geographic Channel. It salutes the spirit of the Border Security Forces of India, their extreme sacrifices and distinct identity as saviours of peace while defending the borders for the last 51 years.
tagline: BSF (Border Security Force): India's First Line of Defence
title: BSF: India's First Line of Defence
